title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.3 - Permits required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.3 - Permits required

State Regulations
(a) For
the purpose of this Part, outdoor recreational activities shall mean all
recreational or sporting activities conducted outside, and shall include, but
not be limited to: bird watching, berry picking, sightseeing, hiking, camping, picnicking, boating, hunting, fishing, and trapping. The following shall not be
deemed outdoor activities for the purposes of this Part since other permits are
required: snowmobiling, woodcutting, or operation of two-wheel or three-wheel
motorcycles or all-terrain vehicles off roads. (b) No person shall engage in outdoor
recreational activities in the area without having first obtained a Fort Drum
recreational permit to do. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
55.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
